result.correct_soap_O:
-Nuchal translucency measurement: 1.7 mm (within normal limits).
Screening for Down syndrome and trisomy 18: low risk.
Cell-free fetal DNA testing results: negative for Down syndrome.
result.correct_soap_P:
-Order the genetic testing as discussed.
No need to repeat the Down syndrome screening during the second trimester since cell-free fetal DNA testing was performed and returned negative.
Continue to monitor for fetal movement; expect to start feeling movement in the second trimester.
Patient to return for the scheduled second trimester anatomy ultrasound.
Encourage continued exercise and healthy lifestyle to support pregnancy.
result.correct_soap_A:
-Normal first trimester genetic screening results.
Low risk for chromosomal abnormalities; ongoing healthy pregnancy.
result.correct_soap_S:
-Follow-up on first trimester results and discussion of second trimester plans.
Patient discussed confusion regarding genetic testing orders with the genetic counselor.
Plans to go for genetic screening after the appointment.
Patient inquired about scheduling the second trimester anatomy ultrasound; confirmed it is scheduled for about a month from now.
Reports feeling well and continuing light exercise, including walking.
